(Battera was already out of the CR and walked to her room. But for 
story, Battera still has the Pred symbol on her arm. If you want to 
follow her to her room and talk about that, that's ok. Or confront 
her, not knowing why a predacon was on a maxiaml ship)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Eclipse::
> 
>     He stood outside the CR Chamber's doorway. When Battera came 
out he held out his hand to help her.
>     "Let me help, you've been wounded badly," He said. His nose 
sensors were not functional in this mode. (Kinda a trade off, he 
doesn't have a comm system in beast mode)
